name: Large Flower Sofa
description: Designed by Roberto Lazzeroni in 1992 for the hotel industry but also perfect for spacious domestic environments, the Large Flower circular sofa is a refined and elegant design suitable for placement in the center of a room or hotel lobby. The distinctive feature of this sofa is its backless design. A central North American walnut solid wood support holds a double-layered transparent brown glass vase, with an inner vase supported by a polished brass structure above the outer layer, intended to pay homage to 19th-century vintage style, reinterpreted in a modern key.
